subject: Re: Homepage images
preview: Hi Jaqui, Perfect, thanks for letting us know.

full_threads.body:
Hi Jaqui, 

Perfect, thanks for letting us know.
Thanks Chris. Happy with it now

Hi Jaqui, 

I left a VM a few minutes ago. 

In short, I worked with the design team to maintain the image balance, while removing the fire extinguisher. When possible, please review and let me know if there are any further updates: https://wolper.com.au
@glen do you think the AI in photoshop can remove the red fire extinguisher? It will mean the photo remains balanced.

action.text: Chris Paradowski assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris
Please crop it so that you don't see the fire extinguisher and more of the other side. I would also like it to be zoomed out a bit more as below.
Thanks



Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Jaqui, 

Chris here jumping in on behalf of Rica and Heath. 

Confirming our dev team have updated the homepage image. Can you please confirm you are happy with the zoom and overall appearance?

action.text: Chris Paradowski assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body: Hi Rica - just checking if this is still being worked on?  I am not happy with what it is currently

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Ok thank you. I received an email this morning saying it was all done so I didn't realise you were still working on them.

Also I have noticed you have now replaced the homepage image….can you please zoom out so much more of the image is shown?

Thanks

30mins
done updating the header image and the tile images on the below section of the homepage

Hello Jaqui,

I understand. Please be aware that we are actively working on the requested changes, but they are not yet finalized. I will certainly keep you informed as soon as all the tasks are completed.

Your patience and cooperation are greatly appreciated during this process.

Hello Jaqui,

I understanding. Please be aware that we are actively working on the requested changes, but they are not yet finalized. I will certainly keep you informed as soon as all the tasks are completed.

Your patience and cooperation are greatly appreciated during this process.

Hi Rica

The first point in my email below about changing the main picture on the homepage hasn't been done. Can you please make sure that when you change it you alter the sizing of the banner and the image so that we see the majority of the image? Maybe send me a screenshot first?

Thanks

Jaqui

Hi Rica

This doesn't look good. Can you please change the sizing so that the images are all the same size?

Thanks

Hi Jaqui,

I wanted to inform you that we have received your requests, and our team is actively working on it. However, I want to acknowledge that it's taking a bit longer than anticipated to complete.

We will continue working on it and we will update you tomorrow.

Thank you for your understanding.
@glen Im sorry I tried to change the homepage image however I cannot make it right and i need your help

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi guys


I'm updating images on our website as we recently have had new photography done. Can you please help me with these changes to the homepage


1. The image of this lady to be replaced with 8597-Wolper0386.jpg






2. The image for video gallery to be changed to Coffee.png

3. The image for MoveWell to be changed to 8597-Wolper0892.jpg

4. The image for Support us to be changed to Membership application.jpg





Many thanks

Jaqui



Jaqui Herman

Marketing Executive, Wolper Jewish Hospital

T: 02 8324 2238 M: 0433 691 848

8 Trelawney Street Woollahra NSW 2025

wolper.com.au
